message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.SI 

The paper deals with a machine learning problem of selecting web links to maximize revenue while ensuring a preset threshold of attractiveness. This involves modeling the problem with a constrained stochastic multi-armed bandit formulation and designing an efficient link selection algorithm. The paper also conducts extensive experiments on real-world datasets. Based on this, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IR (Information Retrieval), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks).
